charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1101_0100_2:
Invited by Flannery, [Name:PlayerNickname ]
arrived at the volcano for training.
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_0300_1:
Did you both come here to train as well? Brilliant!
You two are on fire!
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_0400_1: Why don’t we train together? Please?!
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_0500_1:
As a fellow Fire-type Gym Leader from Hoenn, I
wanna learn from you!
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_0600_1: Sure, I don’t mind! Let’s get to it!
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_1000_1:
You don’t look so good. Is the heat here too much
for you?
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_0401_1200_1: That’s not good! Here, take my water bottle!
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_0402_1400_1:
Not at all! We’re constantly surrounded by
Fire-type Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_1500_1:
I can see how the heat from this volcano might
be too intense for someone who’s not a dedicated
Fire-type Trainer...
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_1600_1: But that heat is exactly why I choose to train here!
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_1700_1:
I bet you can tell from this distance, but
Centiskorch emanates extreme heat from its body.
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_1800_1:
If I’m not used to high temperatures, I won’t be
able to perform at my fullest!
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_1900_1:
In the end, the match is decided by which side is
able to unleash their true potential...
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_2000_1: That’s why places like this are perfect for training!
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_2100_1:
My Gym in Lavaridge Town runs hot, too, thanks
to all the hot springs there!
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_2200_1:
Lavaridge’s hot springs, huh... Now that takes me
back! Another great place to train!
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_2300_1: Speaking of which, let’s start our training!
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_2400_1: How does a Pokémon battle sound to you two?
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_2500_1: I’d like to learn from you youngsters!
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_2600_1:
A definite yes from me! How about you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_0401_2800_1:
There we go, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
All fired up!
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_0302_2900_1: You want to learn from us?
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_3100_1:
I can pass on my knowledge and experience as
a long-time Gym Leader...
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_3200_1:
and in return, I could get some new perspectives
and ideas from you two!
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_3300_1:
As long as we’re alive, we should keep on
learning and training!
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_3500_1:
All right, then—let’s have a white-hot Pokémon
battle!
charaepi_ch0252_00_kabu/2301_1201_3600_1: We’ll show this volcano a thing or two about heat!
